column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////The food is pretty yummy especially on a cold winter night. The price point is a little high for what you get but because of the location
column2: I kind of expected this. Parking is a nightmare as always in Midtown
column3: but I believe everyone should try this place if you're obsessed with Ramen
column6: or anything spicy! I believe it's one of those places that will be around for at most two years
column7: so might as well try it before it turns into another restaurant!
